A keychain with a built-in GPS tracker: This keychain could be used to keep track of the location of keys and other important items. It could also be used to find lost items and could be integrated with a mobile app for easy access to the location of the keychain. Confidence score: 0.9

A keychain with a solar-powered USB charger: This keychain could be used to charge mobile devices on the go, and could be powered by solar energy. It could also be used to charge other small devices such as watches and fitness trackers. Confidence score: 0.8

A keychain with a built-in fingerprint scanner: This keychain could be used to unlock doors and other devices that require a fingerprint. It could also be used to store and manage fingerprint data for other devices. Confidence score: 0.6

A keychain with a built-in speaker: This keychain could be used to play music on the go, and could be powered by a small battery. It could also be used to make phone calls and send text messages through a mobile app. Confidence score: 0.5
